name: notify-on-file
description: Show Information Message or Status bar update on file create/delete/change. Supports multiple watchers and autoSave action.

notify-on-file.notify.description: Single watcher configuration (legacy, use watchers instead)

notify-on-file.watchers.description: Multiple watcher configurations. Each watcher can have path, globPattern, onCreate, onChange, onDelete action lists. Actions: notify, showStatusBarItem, removeStatusBarItem, autoSave.
